alert.note: Alert for Millard (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 3:53PM MDT until July 19 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MILLARD COUNTY... At 352 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 36 miles northeast of Garrison, or 38 miles east of Baker, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Millard County. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 25 and 39. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
